A Brief Overview

Glance Packaging Private Limited is a one stop destination for the best quality of Mild steel drums since 2010.
We expertise in the production ranging from 5lt to 25lt of various mouths such as - 1 3/4’’ screw & cap fitted, 2’’ flange & bung fitted, 4’’ neck and plug fitted and 7’’ neck and plug fitted.
All these are required in the fields of paints, adhesives, printing inks, bitumen, chemical etc.
We use premium quality steel from Bhushan Power and Steel Ltd (currently known as JSW Steel Ltd) to manufacture the exclusive range of products.

The array of drums is made non-toxic, durable and resistance against corrosion and chemicals. Prioritizing customer’s satisfaction, we ensure quality check to provide customers the highest quality at market leading prices.
All the products are thoroughly inspected before the dispatch activity which completely diminishes chances of defected shipping.

With the immortal support of our Managing Director, Mr. Prasanta Saha, his dedication towards our organization, his positive attitude and rich business knowledge, we have been able to carve a prominent position in this domain.
Keeping in mind the convenience of the customers we welcome all modes of payment services like - Cash, Cheques, Online Bank Payments (NEFT, IMPS & RTGS). Our endeavor reflects our efforts towards expanding the line of products and services to reach a larger client base.
